text: Contraband () is a 1980 Italian action crime drama movie directed by Lucio Fulci (who also stars). It stars Fabio Testi, Ivana Monti, Guido Alberti, Venantino Venantini, Ajita Wilson, Marcel Bozzuffi and was distributed by CMR International. ==Other websites== * Category:1980 action movies Category:1980 crime drama movies Category:Italian action movies Category:Italian crime movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Lucio Fulci
title: Contraband (1980 movie)
